urls.title: Chinese police 'shooting down' coronavirus patients? Manufactured clip viral - Alt News
urls.description: A video clip is massively viral on social media. It shows a group of men who seem to be wielding guns near a police vehicle subsequently moving inside a residential...

text:
@lym104_hker @SolomonYue Fake News! The video isn't from Wuhan.  The initial character on licence plate issued for Wuhan (Hubei Provence) is 'A'. But the license number on the police vehicle is ‘G1796’ where ‘G’ stands for Jinhua (Zhejiang Provence).
Here is @AltNews #FactCheck https://t.co/Ka7pXgcQxl

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
